General.Name: China Modern Dairy Holdings Ltd
General.Description: China Modern Dairy Holdings Ltd., an investment holding company, produces and sells milk in Mainland China, the United States, and internationally. The company produces and sells raw milk to customers for processing into dairy products. It is also involved in the production, trading, and sale of feeds; and breeding of dairy cows. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Maanshan, the People's Republic of China. China Modern Dairy Holdings Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Mengniu Dairy Company Limited.
General.Address: Economic and Technological Devt. Zone, Maanshan, China
